snippet: Mr. Alden was an actor for 50 years, on TV shows like “The Legend of Wyatt Earp,” “The Untouchables” and “My Three Sons,” and in movies like “Back to the Future” and “Ed Wood.”
abstract: Norman Alden, character actor in movies and on television, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Alden was an actor for 50 years, on TV shows like “The Legend of Wyatt Earp,” “The Untouchables” and “My Three Sons,” and in movies like “Back to the Future” and “Ed Wood.”

headline.seo: Norman Alden, Character Actor, Dies at 87
headline.main: Norman Alden, a Character Actor for 50 Years, Is Dead at 87
headline.print_headline: Norman Alden, 87, Character Actor in Movies and on Television
